==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=怎么着|type=21}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=zěnmezhe
|c=zam2 mo1 zoek6
|cat=ph
}}

===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}
# {{lb|zh|informal}} {{non-gloss definition|Used to serve as a substitute for a verb phrase or a noun phrase}}; [[what]], [[how]], [[whatever]]
#: 你想'''怎麼著'''?
#:: Nǐ xiǎng '''zěnmezhe'''?
#:: '''What''' do you want? / '''What''' do you want '''to do'''?
#: 不管'''怎麼著''', 都不要開門!
#:: Bùguǎn '''zěnmezhe''', dōu bùyào kāi mén!
#:: No matter '''what happens''', don't open the door!

====Usage notes====
* 著 is often pronounced as [[zhāo]] in casual conversations.
